i like to create art.

i like to listen to rap music.

participant_2.background:
I love learning about my heritage and the Greek culture.
I think my family would be disappointed, but they would still love me.
I love my family, but my pets are my best friends.
I'm going to watch some YouTube videos about welding and then go for a walk in the park.
I once saw a whale while on a boat trip with my family.

content.text: What is something you like to do for fun?
I love learning about my heritage and Greek culture! What about you?
I like to create art and listen to rap music. I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
I love my family, but my pets are my best friends. I once saw a whale while on a boat trip with my family.
That sounds like a great experience! I'm sure it was amazing to see a whale up close.
It was incredible! I'm so glad I got to experience that with my family.
What are some of your favorite rap artists?
I like a lot of different artists, but I'd say Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake are some of my favorites.
I love Kendrick Lamar! He's so talented.
He is! I'm excited to see what he releases next.
Me too! I'm sure it will be amazing.
